Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending the rent stabilization laws
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

Items.Title: Resolution determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after July 1, 2022.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Determining that a public emergency requiring rent control in the City of New York continues to exist and will continue to exist on and after July 1, 2022.
